channel.title: Boards on ASF Community Development
channel.description: Recent content in Boards on ASF Community Development

item.title: An overview of board responsibilities
item.description: What to Expect When You’re Expecting to be a Director ¶ What’s involved in being a director at the ASF? This document tries to give an overview of the time commitment involved, and what the work looks like. The official duties of the Board are defined on the Apache Governance website. You should read that doc, and those to which it links, first. This document tries to give a little more flavor, for the benefit of someone who’s considering running for their first term as a Director.
